content: hey friends before you start this craft
make sure to check out short tip number 110 where I show mostly how to do this
craft I'm just going to do somewhere a little bit of recap and show you what's
different about this craft a crafters we're back for some more fun right and
I'm doing the gray use this time and are you gonna use the baby blue glue sticks
from sure bonder so check those out pick them up and you can craft along with the
DM Scotty alright just like the other uses we are going to make blobs in the
water right and the blobs are gonna be medium sized so we're going for the 1
inch size and I'm not touching the nozzle with the water it can be hard to
see in the video but so don't touch the water with the nozzle or anything like
that right ok cool so now that that's done we're gonna do the pseudopods like
we did before but this time we are going to make them larger right because of the
description of the gray use it talks about being like a snake so I was trying
to go for like a single like thick suit of pod so I'm trying to make the
pseudopods thicker kind of doubling back on itself to make it thicker in the
water see there and that's what we're gonna do to make the the single
pseudopod for the grey use so like the other ruse is we're gonna
fill in the top here and then we're gonna attach these large pseudopods kind
of like I'm going for like a snake look cuz that's like the description that it
kind of slithers like a snake right and so I'm going to glue that on like it did
the other pseudopods but unlike the other pseudopods I'm actually gonna kind
of double up on some glue when I glue it on and so there's some strands of glue
coming up from the body onto the pseudopod because it's such a large
pseudopod now as you can see these are baby blue they look kind of like a light
grey though right so I'm gonna dirty them up a bit to kind of fit in more
with the stone something I haven't done with the other slimes and jellies right
and oozes I am going to dip it in a black wash okay and that will let that
dry and that will kind of dirty up the gray who's to make it look a little more
like stone as Roderick and hilga continue their investigations they come
across the room with broken terrain they carefully pick their way through when
suddenly some of what seemed like boulders spring to life and slithering
at them with powerful pseudopod ready to engulf them and dissolve them hey
friends and fellow crafters I hope you enjoy these vids as much as I enjoy
making them for you if you want to get more involved in the crafts subscribe
also check out my patreon I've got extra content on there as well as a

check out my links below they're affiliated links and it gives me a
